evidence.claim: Carisk Partners emphasizes its commitment to HIPAA compliance across its services.
The company utilizes X12 transaction sets for electronic data interchange, specifically in health care.
Integration of data through RESTful APIs is mentioned in their engineering overview.
Carisk offers services that align with FHIR standards, particularly in connectivity to EHR systems.
The company is actively hiring for roles in cloud infrastructure and data management, implying use of modern cloud services.

icp.icp_reason: Carisk Partners appears to engage in HIPAA X12 transactions relevant to claims and eligibility.
